s:service.name: DeviceService
s:service.s:description: Entry points for the device service, which covers global operations on devices not handled by the device object capabilities.

s:method.name: SyncDevices
s:method.description: A request to synchronize the hub local reflexes with device services

s:parameter.name: accountId
s:parameter.description: The account identifier of the hub requesting synchronization

s:parameter.name: placeId
s:parameter.description: The place identifier of the hub requesting synchronization

s:parameter.name: reflexVersion
s:parameter.description: The version of hub local reflexes currently supported by the hub

s:parameter.name: devices
s:parameter.description: A base64 encoded and gzipped json list of SyncDeviceInfo objects

s:return.name: pins
s:return.description: A map from person id to SHA-1 hashed pin for that person

s:return.name: devices
s:return.description: A base64 encoded and gzipped json list of SyncDeviceState objects

s:return.name: drivers
s:return.description: A base64 encoded and gzipped json list of ReflexDriverDefinition objects

s:event.name: DevicesDegraded
s:event.description: Emitted by the hub to driver services when the hub detects that the degraded state of some devices has changed

s:parameter.name: placeId
s:parameter.description: The place identifier of the hub sending the degraded device information.

s:parameter.name: devices
s:parameter.description: A base64 encoded and gzipped json list of DegradedInfo objects
